comment: Obsolete version of ~ spsbim as of 6-Jul-2023. Specialization of implication. Version of ~ spsbim with a disjoint variable condition, not requiring ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 19-Jan-2023.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
